title: Past Life Regression: A Manual for Hypnotherapists to Conduct Effective Past Life Regression Sessions
description: A Complete Guidebook on Past Life Regression Hypnotherapy. Past Life Regression can be recreational for some people, a way to satisfy their curiosity. For others this modality has tremendous therapeutic value. Mental, emotional, spiritual and even physical healing can take place in a past life regression session. This book introduces many tech- niques, and covers them in detail, for how to conduct an effective Past Life Regression session. Kemila shares a lot of her case work as examples.This book is suitable for hypnosis professionals and interested members of the general public. It is full of scripts and reveals detailed step-by-step methods.
author: Kemila Zsange
